author: Barbara Shecter
title: Manulife to offer mortgage, credit card relief to those affected by COVID-19
description: Manulife Canada CEO Mike Doughty says relief to be decided on case-by-case basis
content:
Manulife Financial Corp.’s Canadian unit is prepared to provide relief from credit card or mortgage obligations to its banking customers who are directly impacted by economic fallout from the COVID-19 pandemic.
“We are approaching, on a case-by-case basis, i… [+4509 chars]
